content.en: Ultrasound image enhancement: Researchers are using algorithms to improve the quality of ultrasound imaging. They are exploring techniques such as multielement synthetic transmit aperture imaging, adaptive weighting, Golay coded transmission, synthetic aperture focusing, and more. By applying these algorithms, they aim to enhance image resolution, reduce noise, and improve the overall quality of ultrasound images.
content.da: Forbedring af ultralydsbilleder: Forskere bruger algoritmer til at forbedre kvaliteten af ultralydsbilleder. De undersøger teknikker som multielement syntetisk transmitteraperturbilleder, adaptiv vægtning, Golay-kodet transmission, syntetisk aperturfokusering og mere. Ved at anvende disse algoritmer sigter de efter at forbedre billedopløsningen, reducere støj og forbedre den overordnede kvalitet af ultralydsbilleder.
